pullRequest.title: chore(broker): Add startup and close processes metrics
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Implement metrics to measure the start and close process steps.
Related issues

closes #3913
Definition of Done
Not all items need to be done depending on the issue and the pull request.
Code changes:

 The changes are backwards compatibility with previous versions
 If it fixes a bug then PRs are created to backport the fix to the last two minor versions

Testing:

 There are unit/integration tests that verify all acceptance criterias of the issue
 New tests are written to ensure backwards compatibility with further versions
 The behavior is tested manually
 The impact of the changes is verified by a benchmark

Documentation:

 The documentation is updated (e.g. BPMN reference, configuration, examples, get-started guides, etc.)
 New content is added to the release announcement

nodes.bodyText: A bit unsure with this name. Maybe we can change it to BrokerStepMetrics or BrokerMetrics? What do you think?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@

+ * Copyright Camunda Services GmbH and/or licensed to Camunda Services GmbH under
+ * one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed

+ */
+package io.zeebe.broker.system.monitoring;
+
+import io.prometheus.client.Gauge;
+
+public class ProcessLifetimeMetrics {

@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright Camunda Services GmbH and/or licensed to Camunda Services GmbH under
+ * one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed
+ * with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+ * Licensed under the Zeebe Community License 1.0. You may not use this file
+ * except in compliance with the Zeebe Community License 1.0.
+ */
+package io.zeebe.broker.system.monitoring;
+
+import io.prometheus.client.Gauge;
+
+public class ProcessLifetimeMetrics {
+
+  public static final String ZEEBE_NAMESPACE = "zeebe";
+  public static final String PROCESS_NAME_LABEL = "processName";
+  public static final String STEP_NAME_LABEL = "stepName";
+  private static final Gauge STARTUP_METRIC =
+      Gauge.build()
+          .namespace(ZEEBE_NAMESPACE)
+          .name("broker_process_startup_metric")

@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright Camunda Services GmbH and/or licensed to Camunda Services GmbH under
+ * one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed
+ * with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+ * Licensed under the Zeebe Community License 1.0. You may not use this file
+ * except in compliance with the Zeebe Community License 1.0.
+ */
+package io.zeebe.broker.system.monitoring;
+
+import io.prometheus.client.Gauge;
+
+public class ProcessLifetimeMetrics {
+
+  public static final String ZEEBE_NAMESPACE = "zeebe";
+  public static final String PROCESS_NAME_LABEL = "processName";
+  public static final String STEP_NAME_LABEL = "stepName";
+  private static final Gauge STARTUP_METRIC =
+      Gauge.build()
+          .namespace(ZEEBE_NAMESPACE)
+          .name("broker_process_startup_metric")
+          .labelNames(PROCESS_NAME_LABEL, STEP_NAME_LABEL)
+          .create()
+          .register();
+
+  private static final Gauge CLOSE_METRICS =
+      Gauge.build()
+          .namespace(ZEEBE_NAMESPACE)
+          .name("broker_process_close_metric")

nodes.bodyText: Please add an help to the metric, which describes what it actually contains. Like: "Time for each broker start step to complete."

nodes.bodyText: Normally we use observe, could you change that please.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright Camunda Services GmbH and/or licensed to Camunda Services GmbH under
+ * one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed
+ * with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+ * Licensed under the Zeebe Community License 1.0. You may not use this file
+ * except in compliance with the Zeebe Community License 1.0.
+ */
+package io.zeebe.broker.system.monitoring;
+
+import io.prometheus.client.Gauge;
+
+public class ProcessLifetimeMetrics {
+
+  public static final String ZEEBE_NAMESPACE = "zeebe";
+  public static final String PROCESS_NAME_LABEL = "processName";
+  public static final String STEP_NAME_LABEL = "stepName";
+  private static final Gauge STARTUP_METRIC =
+      Gauge.build()
+          .namespace(ZEEBE_NAMESPACE)
+          .name("broker_process_startup_metric")
+          .labelNames(PROCESS_NAME_LABEL, STEP_NAME_LABEL)
+          .create()
+          .register();
+
+  private static final Gauge CLOSE_METRICS =
+      Gauge.build()
+          .namespace(ZEEBE_NAMESPACE)
+          .name("broker_process_close_metric")
+          .labelNames(PROCESS_NAME_LABEL, STEP_NAME_LABEL)
+          .create()
+          .register();
+
+  private final String processName;
+
+  public ProcessLifetimeMetrics(final String processName) {
+    this.processName = processName;
+  }
+
+  /**
+   * Meter the time to start for a single step.
+   *
+   * @param stepName the name of the step
+   * @param startupDuration the step start duration in ms
+   */
+  public void meterStartupTimeForStep(String stepName, long startupDuration) {

nodes.bodyText: I think we didn't need the "process name", this is automatically added by Prometheus on which pod this metric was scraped.
